snippet.title: The Da Vinci Code - Full Game Walkthrough
snippet.description:
The Da Vinci Code is a third-person action-adventure puzzle video game developed by The Collective, Inc. and published by 2K Games, originally released in May 2006. It follows the same story of the book, where Robert Langdon, a Harvard professor of symbology, is called to the Louvre museum in Paris, to investigate a murder. The victim is the museum's curator, Jacques Saunière, who has left a series of cryptic clues that Langdon and DCPJ cryptographer Sophie Neveu must decipher in order to uncover a secret that could shake the foundations of Christianity. As Langdon and Neveu follow the clues, they find themselves embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy involving the Priory of Sion, the Knights Templar, and a search for the Holy Grail. They must solve the puzzles and outwit their adversaries to uncover the truth and prevent a devastating revelation from being exposed.

===== Mods Used =====
• dgVoodoo2 (by Dege): http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2/
• Widescreen Fix (by Automaniak and me): https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2443-the-da-vinci-code-widescreen-fix/
• Higher Quality Music: https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2522-the-da-vinci-code-higher-quality-music-and-ambience-xbox/

===== Game Info =====
• Developer: The Collective, Inc.
• Publisher: 2K Games
• Initial release date: May 19, 2006
• Platforms: Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2, Xbox
• Themes: History, Europe, Renaissance, Middle Ages, Mystery
• Genres: Action-adventure, Puzzle, Stealth
• Engine: Slayer (DirectX 8.1)

===== Walkthrough Info =====
• Platform: Microsoft Windows
• Difficulty: Hard
• Recording: Bandicam
• Editing: VEGAS Pro 19

===== Additional Info =====
• Plot: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Da_Vinci_Code_(video_game)#Plot
• Essential improvements: https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/The_Da_Vinci_Code

===== Timestamps =====
00:00:00 - Logo Intros
00:00:41 - Intro Movie
00:01:53 - Main Menu
00:02:17 - Mission 1: Louvre Museum
00:50:37 - Mission 2: Saint Sulpice
01:33:04 - Mission 3: Normandy Mansion
02:01:18 - Mission 4: Bank of Zurich
02:36:38 - Mission 5: Chateau Villette
03:10:00 - Mission 6: Biggin Hill Airfield
03:34:17 - Mission 7: Temple Church
04:26:34 - Mission 8: Westminster Abbey
05:12:31 - Mission 9: Rosslyn Chapel
05:36:35 - Outro Movie
05:37:37 - Credits
